text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: One day, during the middle of summer<n>camp...

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff...

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Phew... How was that, Trainer?
choice_data_list: That was awesome! Let's do one more lap!
That was awesome! Let's do one more lap!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Okay!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Super Creek's performance has<n>been on point recently. I'm
positive<n>she'll show great improvement by<n>the end of the
summer training camp.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
...Oh my, it's already this late. Time<n>flies when you're
focusing hard.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Hehehe, I'm feeling really good lately.<n>Even though I've
already hit today's<n>targets, I feel like I could keep<n>running.
♪
choice_data_list: But I think it's better to rest now.
But I think it's better to rest now.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Yes, you're right. We've still got<n>plenty of time left at camp.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, it's nothing. I was just thinking<n>how productive I was
today.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: I feel like I'm really taking to the plan<n>you created for me.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
I shouldn't be surprised. You thought<n>about all my needs
when you made it.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
And that's why I think it's time to<n>give you a reward for all
your hard<n>work! ♪

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Yes! ♪ There's a summer festival not<n>far from here. Would
you be interested<n>in going with me?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After gladly accepting her invitation,<n>we head off to the
festival.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, there are so many kids here.<n>It's so nice to see
everyone having<n>fun!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Well then, shall we take a look at the<n>stalls ourselves? ...But
there are so<n>many—I don't know where to begin.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Oh, and of course, we should get<n>some food after all that
training.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Let's buy something, find a place<n>with a nice view, and dig
in. ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Super Creek and I mill around, buying<n>an assortment of fun
things.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The festival gradually becomes more<n>and more packed as
dusk turns to<n>night.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
There are so many people here now.<n>Let's try not to get
separated...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As soon as Creek finishes her<n>sentence, she finds herself
getting<n>swept away in the crowd.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Oh! Oh my!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Trainer! We should—

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: ...Okay!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I grab Super Creek's hand tightly and<n>manage to lead us to
an open area.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
I think we'll be fine over here. It was<n>getting really bad back
there.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
But I'm glad we were able to hold<n>hands and not lose each
other. Hehe...<n>♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Looking down, I realize that our hands<n>are still together.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I quickly let go of her hand.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, there's no need to get all<n>flustered. You were the one
who told<n>me to take your hand.
choice_data_list: Uh, anyway, did you say something earlier?
Uh, anyway, did you say something earlier?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Oh, did I?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: ...Well, we can talk later. The takoyaki<n>is getting cold.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
While eating takoyaki, we gaze at the<n>night ocean
illuminated by the moon<n>and stars.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We sit together quietly, with only the<n>sounds of the waves
marking the<n>passage of time. Finally, Super Creek<n>breaks
the silence.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: About that moment earlier...

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Yeah... when you asked me to take<n>your hand.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Actually I... was going to say the<n>same thing, but you beat
me to it.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: The way you reached out to me... I feltthat you were so dependable.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Yes, definitely. You've already grown<n>so much since the
day we met. I'm<n>really proud of you.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As Creek looks at me gently, a strong<n>motivation swells up
inside of me. The<n>only thing that I want to do is keep<n>
working hard for her.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Um... Trainer... hehe.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
I know this is a serious moment right<n>now, but you've got
takoyaki sauce<n>on your face.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Embarrassed, I quickly stick my hand<n>in my pocket for my
handkerchief. But<n>before I can pull it out...

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Stop! Don't move—just a second.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Super Creek quietly wipes the<n>corners of my mouth.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: ...There we go. All clean now.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, do you remember when you<n>asked me if there was
anything I<n>wanted from you?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: I think I know now. Would you like to<n>hear?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
By gaining more and more<n>experience, I know that you'll<n>
become an even greater trainer than<n>you already are.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
But no matter how much you grow...<n>will you still let me take
care of you?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Hehe... Thank you. It means a lot to<n>me.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
And I hope that we'll continue to<n>spend lots and lots of time
together.
